attributes.action: Brexit means Brexit, No deal is better than the offer made by Theresa May
attributes.additional_details: The EU still has jurisdiction over us in both Trade and Law, nearly everything will stay the same except we will be removing our own voice in Brussels, it is a joke and an insult to the British people and to democracy, Theresa May out!!!! Britain out!!!!!
attributes.background:
The plan currently made by Theresa May for the EU is a joke that stands not only against the British people but against democracy itself.
Her plan will bury this country, a no deal and a new prime minister is what we need
